rooms.description: A spacious living room with colonial aesthetics, incorporating Vastu principles by having entrances aligned with the east and north.
Large dining area adjacent to kitchen, ensuring a balanced flow between cooking and social spaces as per Vastu guidelines.
A colonial-styled kitchen with ample counter space. Includes wheelchair accessible features such as lowered countertops and wide doorways.
The master bedroom is located in a prime location per Vastu (northwest) with colonial detailing. Features wheelchair-accessible design including accessible bathroom adjacent to it.
A guest bedroom following colonial style, positioned to ensure positive energy flow and easy access from the living area.
Dedicated servant's quarters with a small private kitchenette and bedroom. Designed for accessibility and privacy.
A home theater designed in colonial style, with acoustic treatments and ample seating. Incorporates Vastu principles ensuring that the space is harmonious and well-balanced.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with colonial features, wheelchair accessible ramp integrated.

openings.location: Various walls across the ground floor
openings.description: Large windows to ensure ample natural light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
